response.overview: Film exploring the challenges of investigating and prosecuting child sexual abuse, and how to manage predators when they've been caught. Detective Claire Lyons, who works for Hampshire Constabulary's Internet Child Abuse Team, has to prove that her suspicions are right about a man who has been uploading indecent images of children - and not risk any mistakes that would lead to the suspect walking free and being able to offend again.
response.title: Catching Paedophiles
